title: Getting the "Not enough RP/IP" Bug
body:
Started happening today right when I logged on like a half hour ago, I logged in and out a couple times, done every basic thing you would be told too do to fix and it's still giving me the Bug

I have 4882 IP and I can't buy Varus.

Do I have to run the Repair or is it something that won't be fixed by even that?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm not 100% sure on this issue, but it seems to only affect the beta client. Could you try switching back to the legacy client and attempting to make the purchase for me.

* Does this work as expected?
I'm having the same problem, i cant buy tristana for 1350 ip, when i have 1443. Please help
Doing a full repair did nothing...
